channel.title: Dario's Blog
channel.description: ...a software engineer based in Zagreb, Croatia. I write about all kinds of tech stuff, mostly related to software development and devops. Currently, my main focus is JavaScript/TypeScript and related technologies.

item.title: Adding Cognito user via AWS API
item.description: Adding a Cognito user through the AWS console easy, but what if you wanted to do it through the AWS API?
item.author: dario@darios.blog (Dario Djuric)
